about_the_game:
SeDECKtion is the first TCG about ♂️seduction♀️ and 💕flirting.
In SeDECKtion the Players use Characters to seduce and compete for the attention of each other.
Each Character has different preferences and traits, such as:
🧠 Smart
👄 Beautiful
💰 Rich
⭐ Famous and more.
Use your Characters to draw the attention of other Characters if your preferences match the target's traits and vice versa.

There are all kinds of Characters - Politician, Teacher, Doctor, Secretary, etc.

☝️ But!
A Teacher Lady is only interested in Smart guys (or ladies). At the same time, a Politician doesn't want to show off his private life to the public, and a Secretary is super-fast to seduce the Rich (like, for example, an Entrepreneur).


Though the game is easy to learn and play at first glance, the variety of combinations and strategies will surprise you.
The game is under development right now - and nothing can support us as strong as your interest in this brave game concept (or not).
Please, share your feedback and questions!

content_descriptors.notes: The game uses pin-up/flirt-themed illustrations of some Characters that could be considered as sexual ones by someone though, lingerie is the maximum level of 'sexy' depiction. No nudity or more explicit themes in the game.

SeDECKtion is the first TCG about ♂️seduction♀️ and 💕flirting.
In SeDECKtion the Players use Characters to seduce and compete for the attention of each other.
Each Character has different preferences and traits, such as:
🧠 Smart

⭐ Famous and more.
Use your Characters to draw the attention of other Characters if your preferences match the target's traits and vice versa.

There are all kinds of Characters - Politician, Teacher, Doctor, Secretary, etc.

☝️ But!
A Teacher Lady is only interested in Smart guys (or ladies). At the same time, a Politician doesn't want to show off his private life to the public, and a Secretary is super-fast to seduce the Rich (like, for example, an Entrepreneur).


Though the game is easy to learn and play at first glance, the variety of combinations and strategies will surprise you.

name: SeDECKtion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5600+ or Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 8800 or Equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Quad Q9300 @ 2.50GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: SeDECKtion is the first TCG where strategy meets seduction!Compete for attention and match traits and preferences of Characters to win.The game is under development.Please, share your feedback and questions about this brave game concept.
